data.title: Freiburg, Germany
data.meta_description: Freiburg, Germany - Detailed weather forecast for tomorrow. Hourly forecast for tomorrow - including weather conditions, temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, dewpoint, wind, visibility, and UV index data.
data.text:
Weather forecast and temperature for tomorrow - Saturday, 17. Aug

06:26

20:38

CEST

Partly Cloudy

28°C / 17°C

Wind: 9km/h NW

Humidity: 58%

Precip. probability: 6%

Precipitation: 3mm

UV index: 6

On Saturday, 17th of August, partially clouded weather is anticipated as well.

Minimal precipitation is forecasted for tomorrow. Predicted temperatures will peak at a moderately hot 28°C (82.4°F) and dip to a minimum of an enjoyable 17°C (62.6°F).

The maximum heat index, which calculates the temperature value influenced by the moisture in the air, is computed to be 29°C (84.2°F).

Tomorrow, the highest anticipated temperature will be a few degrees higher than the typical maximum for August temperature.

Sunrise will be at 06:26 and sunset at 20:38; tomorrow's daylight will last for 14h and 11min.

Frequently asked questions

What is the weather forecast for Freiburg for tomorrow?

On Saturday, 17th of August, the weather will be partly cloudy.

Will it rain tomorrow?

Tomorrow, there is a low probability of minimal rainfall in Freiburg.

What will be the highest temperature tomorrow?

Tomorrow, the highest temperature will be 28°C (82.4°F), while the lowest temperature will be 17°C (62.6°F). The maximum heat index, which takes the relative humidity and factors it into the air temperature reading, is appraised at 29°C (84.2°F).

Tomorrow, the highest temperature will be relatively higher than the average maximum temperature in August. The lowest temperature tomorrow will be also a few degrees higher than the average low temperature.

When are sunrise and sunset tomorrow?

On Saturday, in Freiburg, sunrise will be at 06:26 and sunset at 20:38 (CEST).

How many hours of daylight will Freiburg have tomorrow?

In Freiburg, the length of the day tomorrow will be 14h and 11min.
